trends: There has been one other sighting in Harvey
There were no other sightings in Harvey on or around March 11th 2011
Summary: I saw a UFO over my house.
divs: Sighting DetailsI was sitting in my living room watching TV and working on a project. I heard a humming sound and saw a bright light and I didn't know what it was. A bright light came in from the front window and the side kitchen window. The kitchen window started to shake and it scared me. I looked out the back window and saw it hovering over my house and then slowly moved off into the distance. I would really appreciate it if someone could contact me.
